OOC:wolfgang used to be the alliances co-leader. Wolfgang is a snow wolf

:: Wolfgang ::

:: Once Wolfgang notices the two bots with guns blaring, he reaches to his 
side where his ice blaster should be, pulling up a hand full of air. ::

I recomend that you drop your weapons before I call my troops, the mighty 
alliance.

:: When Wolfgang notices that his ice blaster is missing, he jumps back and 
pulls out his outdated, broken, com-link ::

Alliance members, two bots have broken through our defence and are armed. 
Immediate backup is neccesary.

:: Wolfgang chuckles nervously, remembering lost thoughts
